input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is SCOMActor

This wrapper returns monitoring class associated with a management pack
Sample Item XML:
<items> <item> <operation-name>get-monitoringclass-by-management-pack</operation-name> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> <command-parameters> <managementpack> <managementpack-id>66de9512-d446-f46b-bb85-197ec864f1f7</managementpack-id> </managementpack> </command-parameters> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
operation-name[Required] Operation that will be executed
timeout-secs[Optional] Time in seconds after which the request will time-out of not completed. Default is: 60 secs
command-parameters[Required] This is the parent tag that contains actual parameters required to execute this particular operation.
managementpack[Required] This is the parent tag that contains the id of the management pack whose associated monitoring classes will be retruned.
managementpack-id[Required] ID of the management pack whose associated monitoring classes will be retruned.

documentation.description: This wrapper returns monitoring class associated with a management pack
